item.title: 谁从特朗普关税中损失最大？谁赢了？
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普试图通过一系列新的美国关税来改写全球秩序，这很可能会使世界经济规模较小，并给美国与盟国和对手的关系注入新的紧张因素。甚至有迹象表明，征税对美国经济造成了损害。【原文：President Donald Trump’s bid to rewrite the global order via a raft of new US tariffs is likely to leave the world economy smaller than it would have been otherwise and inject new tensions into America’s relationships with allies and rivals alike. There are even emerging signs of damage from the levies to the US economy.】

item.title: Nextdoor 裁员 12% 谋求盈利
item.description: 邻里社交网络公司 Nextdoor Holdings Inc. 首席执行官尼拉夫-托里亚（Nirav Tolia）正在裁减 12% 的员工，这是经过多年挣扎后，该公司为实现盈利和重整业务而做出的更广泛努力的一部分。【原文：Nextdoor Holdings Inc., the neighborhood social networking company, is eliminating 12% of its workforce, part of a broader effort by Chief Executive Officer Nirav Tolia to achieve profitability and revamp the business after years of struggles.】

item.title: FanDuel-Parent Flutter 提升了对美国体育赛事结果的展望
item.description: FanDuel在线博彩业务的母公司Flutter Entertainment Plc上调了2025年的业绩展望，原因是第二季度美国体育博彩业务对该公司有利，而且该公司能够抵消税务费用。【原文：Flutter Entertainment Plc, parent of the FanDuel online betting business, raised its outlook for 2025 after US sports bets in the second quarter went the company’s way and it was able to offset tax charges.】

item.title: Instacart 实现 2022 年以来最强劲订单增长，盈利超出预期
item.description: Instacart 连续两个季度实现了自 2022 年以来最强劲的订单增长，当期盈利也超过了预期，这表明其核心快递业务在推出迎合价格敏感型消费者的举措后恢复了活力。【原文：Instacart posted its strongest order growth since 2022 for a second straight quarter and beat earnings estimates for the current period, a sign of resilience in its core delivery business after it rolled out initiatives to cater to price-conscious consumers.】

item.title: 通过新的 GPT-5 和 Opus 模型，OpenAI-Anthropic 之间的竞争进一步升级
item.description: OpenAI 和 Anthropic 正在争夺编码员的顶级人工智能模型。但首先...【原文：OpenAI and Anthropic are competing to have the top AI model for coders. But first…】

item.title: 特朗普任命米兰填补美联储理事会席位
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统表示，他已选定经济顾问委员会主席斯蒂芬-米兰担任美联储理事。【原文：President Donald Trump said he had chosen Council of Economic Advisers Chairman Stephen Miran to serve as a Federal Reserve governor.】

item.title: 白宫为特朗普提名米兰为美联储理事做准备
item.description: 据一位熟悉搜寻工作的人士透露，白宫官员正准备让唐纳德-特朗普总统提名经济顾问委员会主席斯蒂芬-米兰（Stephen Miran）担任美联储理事。【原文：White House officials are preparing for President Donald Trump to nominate Council of Economic Advisers Chairman Stephen Miran to serve as a Federal Reserve governor, according to a person familiar with the search.】

item.title: 墨西哥央行降息四分之一点，为利率踩下刹车
item.description: 墨西哥央行放慢了货币宽松的步伐，将基准利率下调了四分之一个百分点，而不是继续最近一连串的半点下调。【原文：Mexico’s central bank slowed the pace of monetary easing by reducing its benchmark interest rate by a quarter percentage point, instead of continuing with a recent string of half-point cuts.】

item.title: 历史性转变加深，美国农产品贸易逆差创纪录
item.description: 2025 年上半年，美国农产品贸易逆差创下历史新高，凸显出在唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易战中，美国农民在全球出口中长期发挥的主导作用持续下降。【原文：The US agricultural trade deficit hit a record high in the first half of 2025, underscoring the continued decline of American farmers’ long-dominant role in global exports amid President Donald Trump’s trade wars.】

item.title: 阿波罗将软银贷款增至破纪录的 54 亿美元
item.description:
为 Vision Fund 2 贷款增资 9 亿美元，展示了阿波罗在净资产收益率贷款中的重要作用。【原文：

The $900 million top-up to Vision Fund 2 loan showcases Apollo’s big role in NAV lending.

】

item.title: 备受争议的监控初创公司 Flock 将人工智能引入警务技术
item.description: Flock Safety 公司周四表示，它将在美国警察部门使用的监控产品中加入人工智能，该公司称这一更新将有助于提高社会安全，而隐私权倡导者则称其 "可恶"。【原文：Flock Safety said Thursday it will add artificial intelligence to its surveillance products used by US police departments, an update the company said will help make society safer and that privacy advocates have called “abominable.”】

item.title: OpenAI 推出更强大的 GPT-5 编码和写作模型
item.description: OpenAI 正在推出功能更强大、期待已久的新人工智能模型 GPT-5，力争在美国和中国竞争对手日益激烈的竞争中保持领先地位。【原文：OpenAI is rolling out a more powerful and long-awaited new artificial intelligence model called GPT-5, vying to stay ahead of increased competition from rivals in the US and China.】

item.title: 据说温克艾沃斯双胞胎将投资与特朗普有关的加密货币矿商
item.description: 据说，亿万富翁温克艾沃斯双胞胎兄弟投资了一家新的加密货币采矿企业，该企业与另一对备受瞩目的兄弟--埃里克-特朗普和小唐纳德-特朗普--有关联。【原文：The billionaire Winklevoss twins are said to have invested in a new crypto-mining venture tied to another set of high-profile brothers, Eric Trump and Donald Trump Jr.】

item.title: 修订美国就业市场数据是家常便饭。原因就在这里。
item.description: 8 月初公布的美国政府数据进行了重大修订，显示劳动力市场的状况比之前想象的更糟，这一事态发展令市场感到震惊，并促使唐纳德-特朗普总统在没有证据的情况下声称这些数据被 "操纵"，并解雇了数据负责人。【原文：Major revisions to US government data released in early August showed the labor market is in a worse position than previously thought, a development that rattled markets and prompted President Donald Trump to claim, without evidence, that the numbers were “rigged” and fire the person in charge of the data.】

item.title: 花旗集团从竞争对手摩根大通聘请 Guillermo Baygual 担任并购业务联席主管
item.description: 花旗集团任命摩根大通公司的吉列尔莫-巴伊瓜尔（Guillermo Baygual）为并购部门联席主管，这只是花旗集团从华尔街竞争对手那里高调招聘投资银行业务人员的最新案例。【原文：Citigroup Inc. has appointed JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s Guillermo Baygual as co-head of mergers and acquisitions in what is just the latest in a string of high-profile investment banking hires from its Wall Street rival.】

item.title: 参议员沃伦敦促美联储库克开启关键的大银行资本缓冲机制
item.description: 美国参议员伊丽莎白-沃伦（Elizabeth Warren）在一封信中敦促美联储理事丽莎-库克（Lisa Cook）启动所谓的反周期资本缓冲。【原文：US Senator Elizabeth Warren urged Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook in a letter to activate what’s known as the countercyclical capital buffer, a tool that Congress authorized the Fed to use as a way to demand banks build up additional cushions of capital during periods of excessive growth.】

item.title: 芝加哥学校债券违约金扩大，7.34 亿美元缺口迫在眉睫
item.description: 市政投资者开始要求对芝加哥被评为垃圾级、资金紧张的学区的债务收取更高的溢价，该学区必须在本月底之前想办法弥补 7.34 亿美元的赤字。【原文：Municipal investors are starting to demand a bigger premium on the debt of Chicago’s junk-rated, cash-strapped school district, which must figure out how to close a $734 million deficit before the end of this month.】

item.title: 即买即付 "应用程序不太可能成为委内瑞拉交易所的新玩家
item.description: 在委内瑞拉，一款 "即买即付 "的应用程序已成为人们购买从服装到轮胎等各种商品的首选，该应用程序正在为该国奄奄一息的证券交易所注入活力，因为它正在努力减轻其商户合作伙伴的融资负担。【原文：A buy-now, pay-later app that’s become a go-to in Venezuela for purchasing everything from clothing to tires is breathing life into the country’s moribund stock exchange as it seeks to ease the financing load of its merchant partners.】

item.title: 医疗补助削减将导致精英教学医院收入减少
item.description: 华盛顿最近削减了医疗补助（Medicaid），美国医疗行业几乎无一幸免，就连一流医学院附属的资金雄厚的教学医院也不例外。【原文：Few in the US healthcare sector are immune to the effects of Washington’s recent cuts to Medicaid, even the cash-rich teaching hospitals affiliated with top-notch medical schools.】

item.title: 军火公司 CSG 被指考虑 IPO，寻求 300 亿欧元估值
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，装甲车辆和弹药制造商捷克斯洛伐克集团正在考虑首次公开募股，寻求 300 亿欧元（349 亿美元）或更高的估值，因为该公司正寻求利用欧洲各国政府增加国防开支的机会。【原文：Armored vehicle and ammunition maker Czechoslovak Group AS is considering an initial public offering, seeking a valuation of €30 billion ($34.9 billion) or more, according to people familiar with the matter, as the firm seeks to capitalize on increased defense spending from Europe’s governments.】

item.title: 美联储博斯蒂克预计 2025 年将降息一次，关税影响或将持续
item.description: 亚特兰大联邦储备银行行长拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）表示，他仍然认为今年有可能降息一次，并重申有理由怀疑关税对通胀的影响将是暂时的。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta President Raphael Bostic said he still views one interest-rate cut as likely this year, and reiterated there are reasons to be skeptical that the inflationary effects from tariffs will be temporary.】

item.title: 关税冲击下的滞胀担忧波及华尔街
item.description: 华尔街策略师发出警报，随着贸易关税的影响开始显现，美国经济正逐渐走向滞胀，这可能会限制美联储降低利率的能力。【原文：Wall Street strategists are sounding alarms that the US economy is drifting toward stagflation as the impact of trade tariffs start to show up, potentially restricting the ability of the Federal Reserve to slash interest-rates.】

item.title: 就业前景改善，美国消费者通胀预期上升
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行的月度调查显示，7 月份美国消费者的通胀预期有所上升，对就业市场的看法也有所改善。【原文：US consumer inflation expectations rose in July and perceptions of the job market improved, according to a monthly Federal Reserve Bank of New York survey.】

item.title: 贝利称对英国央行 "微调 "减息的反应并不意外
item.description: 英国央行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）宣称，他对市场周四缩减对未来降息的押注并不感到意外，并称目前的形势 "非常微妙平衡"。【原文：Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey declared he is not surprised that markets scaled back bets on future interest-rate cuts on Thursday, saying the situation is “very finely balanced.”】

item.title: 法国战场无人机新创公司寻求融资 2 亿美元
item.description: 法国一家开发战场无人机和软件的初创公司正寻求筹集 2 亿美元的早期资金，以满足欧洲对国防相关项目日益增长的需求。【原文：A French startup developing battlefield drones and software is seeking to raise $200 million in early funding, as it attempts to tap the growing appetite for defense-related projects in Europe.】

item.title: 阿布扎比和迪拜探讨铝业公司 EGA 数十亿美元的 IPO 事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，阿联酋全球铝业股份公司（Emirates Global Aluminium PJSC）正在评估首次公开募股的可行性，这可能会重新启动一项可能成为中东地区有史以来规模最大的股票出售交易的计划。【原文：Emirates Global Aluminium PJSC is assessing the feasibility of an initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter, potentially reviving plans for a deal that could rank among the largest-ever share sales in the Middle East.】

item.title: 贝莱德加拿大主管 Marcia Moffat 将于 2026 年离职
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社看到的一份内部备忘录，贝莱德公司加拿大部门主管玛西娅-莫法特（Marcia Moffat）将于明年离职。【原文：The head of BlackRock Inc.’s Canadian unit, Marcia Moffat, will leave the firm next year, according to an internal memo seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 沃勒成为特朗普团队中美联储主席的热门人选
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，美联储理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）正在成为唐纳德-特朗普总统的顾问们寻找杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）接班人时担任央行主席的热门人选。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller is emerging as a top candidate to serve as the central bank’s chair among President Donald Trump’s advisers as they look for a replacement for Jerome Powell, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 私人信贷大力发展开放式基金以吸引散户资金
item.description: 私人信贷正竭尽全力吸引散户投资者，其开放式投资工具越来越受欢迎，为这个快速发展的行业带来了一系列新的风险。【原文：Private credit is pulling out all the stops to attract retail investors with increasingly popular open-ended vehicles that are bringing a new set of risks for the fast-growing industry.】

item.title: 美国电池初创企业 Lyten 收购 Northvolt 在欧洲的剩余业务
item.description: 加利福尼亚州一家开发锂硫电池的初创公司 Lyten Inc. 已同意收购破产制造商 Northvolt AB 在欧洲的全部剩余资产。【原文：Lyten Inc., a California startup that develops lithium-sulfur batteries, has agreed to acquire all of the remaining European assets of bankrupt manufacturer Northvolt AB.】
